00235 inline uint32 
00236 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::getNbrItems() const

00239 }

00241 inline void 
00242 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::setNbrItems( uint32 num )

00247 inline void
00248 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::setBBoxWanted(bool wanted)
00249 {

00251 }
00252

00254 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::getBBoxWanted() const

00260 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::setAllCoordinatesWanted(bool allWanted)

00263 }

00266 CoordinateOnItemRequestPacket::getAllCoordinatesWanted() const
